calculators.name: Percentage Calculator
calculators.description: Instantly figure out "what percent of" or "what is the percentage increase/decrease" between two numbers. Perfect for shopping discounts, grade changes, and quick business math when you need a fast percentage answer without reaching for a spreadsheet.
calculators.calculationFunction: (part: number, whole: number): number => (part / whole) * 100

calculators.name: BMI Calculator
calculators.description: Calculate your Body‑Mass Index (BMI) in seconds using height and weight and see whether you fall in the underweight, normal, overweight, or obese categories. Supports both metric and imperial units, making it ideal for fitness tracking, health apps, and wellness blogs looking to offer quick insight into healthy weight ranges.
calculators.calculationFunction: (weightKg: number, heightCm: number): number => weightKg / ((heightCm / 100) ** 2)

calculators.name: Mortgage Calculator
calculators.description: Estimate your monthly house payment, total interest cost, and payoff schedule for any fixed‑rate home loan. This mortgage calculator helps future homebuyers compare loan terms, down‑payment scenarios, and interest rates—great SEO content for real‑estate, finance, and personal‑budgeting websites.
calculators.calculationFunction: (principal: number, annualRatePct: number, years: number): number => { const r = (annualRatePct / 100) / 12; const n = years * 12; return (principal * r) / (1 - Math.pow(1 + r, -n)); }

calculators.name: Loan Calculator
calculators.description: Compute the monthly payment, total cost, and payoff timeline for car loans, student debt, personal loans, and any other amortized borrowing. A must‑have tool for financial planning blogs, credit‑education resources, and comparison hubs covering loans and debt management strategies.
calculators.calculationFunction: (principal: number, annualRatePct: number, years: number): number => { const r = (annualRatePct / 100) / 12; const n = years * 12; return (principal * r) / (1 - Math.pow(1 + r, -n)); }

calculators.name: Basic Calculator
calculators.description: A lightning‑fast online basic calculator that performs add, subtract, multiply, and divide right in the browser—no calculator app required. Ideal for educational sites, quick‑math landing pages, and productivity toolkits aiming to offer simple arithmetic on the fly.
calculators.calculationFunction: (a: number, op: string, b: number): number => { switch(op){ case '+': return a + b; case '-': return a - b; case '*': return a * b; case '/': return a / b; default: throw new Error('Unsupported operator'); } }

calculators.name: Age Calculator
calculators.description: Find someone’s exact age today or determine the precise difference between any two dates in years, months, days—even hours and minutes. Perfect for birthday websites, HR forms, genealogy projects, and anywhere date interval calculations improve user experience.
calculators.calculationFunction: (date1: string | Date, date2: string | Date): number => { const d1 = new Date(date1); const d2 = new Date(date2); const diffMs = Math.abs(d2.getTime() - d1.getTime()); return diffMs / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24 * 365.25); }

calculators.name: Tip Calculator
calculators.description: Effortlessly calculate how much to tip, the new total bill, and how to split the cost among friends. Great for restaurant reviews, travel guides, and budgeting apps that want to add quick tip‑splitting convenience for diners on the go.
calculators.calculationFunction: (bill: number, tipPct: number, people: number = 1): { tip: number; total: number; perPerson: number } => { const tip = bill * tipPct / 100; const total = bill + tip; return { tip, total, perPerson: total / people }; }

calculators.name: Calorie Calculator
calculators.description: Estimate your personalized daily calorie target using the science‑backed Mifflin‑St Jeor equation, adjusting for age, height, weight, sex, and activity level. Essential for nutrition planners, weight‑loss blogs, and fitness apps aiming to provide accurate caloric guidance to readers.
calculators.calculationFunction: (sex: string, weightKg: number, heightCm: number, ageYears: number, activityFactor: number = 1.2): number => { const bmr = sex === 'male' ? 10 * weightKg + 6.25 * heightCm - 5 * ageYears + 5 : 10 * weightKg + 6.25 * heightCm - 5 * ageYears - 161; return bmr * activityFactor; }

calculators.name: Compound Interest Calculator
calculators.description: Project how your savings or investment will grow with compound interest—including optional monthly or yearly contributions—to visualize wealth accumulation over time. Valuable for personal‑finance portals, retirement calculators, and savings challenge articles seeking engaging, growth‑projection tools.
calculators.calculationFunction: (principal: number, annualRatePct: number, years: number, timesPerYear: number = 1, contribution: number = 0): number => { const r = annualRatePct / 100; const n = timesPerYear; const fvPrincipal = principal * Math.pow(1 + r / n, n * years); const fvContrib = contribution * (Math.pow(1 + r / n, n * years) - 1) / (r / n); return fvPrincipal + fvContrib; }

calculators.name: Date Calculator
calculators.description: Add or subtract days, weeks, or months from a given date, or find the number of days between two dates, accounting for leap years. A handy utility for project managers, travel itineraries, legal deadline calculators, and any content where date math simplifies planning.
calculators.calculationFunction: (startDate: string | Date, days: number): string => { const d = new Date(startDate); d.setDate(d.getDate() + days); return d.toISOString().split('T')[0]; }

calculators.name: Sales Tax Calculator
calculators.description: Quickly calculate the final price of goods or services by adding state or regional sales tax to any pre‑tax amount. Essential for e‑commerce platforms, shopping blogs, and point‑of‑sale guides that want to help users understand true checkout costs.
calculators.calculationFunction: (amount: number, taxPct: number): number => amount * (1 + taxPct / 100)

calculators.name: Discount Calculator
calculators.description: Determine how much you’ll save and what you’ll pay after applying a percentage discount—perfect for Black Friday deals, coupon sites, and online retailers promoting limited‑time offers.
calculators.calculationFunction: (price: number, discountPct: number): number => price * (1 - discountPct / 100)

calculators.name: ROI Calculator
calculators.description: Measure the profitability of any investment or marketing campaign by comparing net gain to initial cost. Ideal for finance blogs, startup dashboards, and digital marketers tracking campaign performance.
calculators.calculationFunction: (gain: number, cost: number): number => ((gain - cost) / cost) * 100

calculators.name: Markup Calculator
calculators.description: Find the selling price or markup percentage needed to hit a target profit margin on any product. Great for small‑business owners, dropshipping resources, and retail pricing strategists.
calculators.calculationFunction: (cost: number, markupPct: number): number => cost * (1 + markupPct / 100)

calculators.name: GPA Calculator
calculators.description: Calculate cumulative Grade Point Average by weighting course grades with credit hours—a valuable academic‑planning tool for students, schools, and education portals.
calculators.calculationFunction: (grades: number[], credits: number[]): number => { let total = 0, creditSum = 0; for(let i=0;i<grades.length;i++){ total += grades[i] * credits[i]; creditSum += credits[i]; } return total / creditSum; }

calculators.name: Hours Calculator
calculators.description: Compute total hours worked between start and end times, streamlining timesheets for freelancers, HR departments, and project managers tracking billable hours.
calculators.calculationFunction: (startTime: string, endTime: string): number => { const ms = new Date(`1970-01-01T${endTime}:00Z`).getTime() - new Date(`1970-01-01T${startTime}:00Z`).getTime(); return ms / 3600000; }

calculators.name: Pregnancy Due Date Calculator
calculators.description: Estimate the expected delivery date by adding 280 days (40 weeks) to the first day of the last menstrual period—vital content for prenatal health apps, pregnancy blogs, and OB‑GYN clinic websites.
calculators.calculationFunction: (lmpDate: string | Date): string => { const d = new Date(lmpDate); d.setDate(d.getDate() + 280); return d.toISOString().split('T')[0]; }

calculators.name: Body Fat Calculator
calculators.description: Approximate body‑fat percentage using the U.S. Navy method with neck, waist, hip, and height measurements—popular on fitness and bodybuilding sites offering physique assessment tools.
calculators.calculationFunction: (sex: string, waistCm: number, neckCm: number, heightCm: number, hipCm: number | null = null): number => { if(sex === 'male'){ return 495 / (1.0324 - 0.19077*Math.log10(waistCm - neckCm) + 0.15456*Math.log10(heightCm)) - 450; } if(sex === 'female'){ if(hipCm === null) throw new Error('Hip circumference required for females'); return 495 / (1.29579 - 0.35004*Math.log10(waistCm + hipCm - neckCm) + 0.221*Math.log10(heightCm)) - 450; } throw new Error('Sex must be "male" or "female"'); }

calculators.name: Target Heart Rate Calculator
calculators.description: Find personalized moderate and vigorous training heart‑rate zones based on age, perfect for cardio workouts, endurance training programs, and sports performance blogs.
calculators.calculationFunction: (age: number): { moderate: [number, number]; vigorous: [number, number] } => { const max = 220 - age; return { moderate: [0.5*max, 0.7*max], vigorous: [0.7*max, 0.85*max] }; }

calculators.name: Sales Margin Calculator
calculators.description: Calculate profit margin percentage or determine selling price and profit based on cost and revenue figures—ideal for e‑commerce entrepreneurs and financial analysis articles.
calculators.calculationFunction: (sellingPrice: number, cost: number): number => ((sellingPrice - cost) / sellingPrice) * 100

calculators.name: Retirement Savings Calculator
calculators.description: Forecast how much you’ll have at retirement age by combining current savings, monthly contributions, expected rate of return, and inflation assumptions. Essential for retirement‑planning guides and financial‑independence blogs.
calculators.calculationFunction: (currentBalance: number, monthlyContrib: number, annualReturnPct: number, years: number): number => { const r = annualReturnPct/100/12; const n = years*12; const futureValue = currentBalance * Math.pow(1+r, n) + monthlyContrib * (Math.pow(1+r, n)-1)/r; return futureValue; }

calculators.name: VAT Calculator
calculators.description: Add or remove Value‑Added Tax from prices quickly for international shoppers and businesses that must handle inclusive and exclusive VAT pricing models.
calculators.calculationFunction: (amount: number, vatPct: number, mode: string = 'add'): number => mode==='add' ? amount*(1+vatPct/100) : amount/(1+vatPct/100)

calculators.name: Currency Converter
calculators.description: Convert one currency to another using a supplied exchange rate—perfect for travel sites, finance dashboards, and ecommerce platforms with global customers.
calculators.calculationFunction: (amount: number, rate: number): number => amount * rate

calculators.name: Fuel Cost Calculator
calculators.description: Estimate total fuel cost for a trip by combining distance, vehicle fuel efficiency, and current fuel price. Great for road‑trip planners, automotive blogs, and fleet‑management tools.
calculators.calculationFunction: (distanceKm: number, efficiencyKmPerLiter: number, pricePerLiter: number): number => (distanceKm / efficiencyKmPerLiter) * pricePerLiter

calculators.name: Pace Calculator
calculators.description: Calculate running or cycling pace (minutes per kilometer or mile) from distance and time—popular with endurance athletes, running clubs, and fitness‑tracking apps.
calculators.calculationFunction: (distanceKm: number, timeMinutes: number): number => timeMinutes / distanceKm

calculators.name: Circle Area Calculator
calculators.description: Instantly compute the area of a circle from its radius or diameter—handy for geometry homework, carpentry projects, and design calculations.
calculators.calculationFunction: (radius: number): number => Math.PI * radius * radius

calculators.name: Quadratic Equation Solver
calculators.description: Solve any quadratic equation (ax² + bx + c = 0) and present real or complex roots, ideal for math students, educators, and tutorial sites.
calculators.calculationFunction: (a: number, b: number, c: number): (number | string)[] => { const discr = b*b - 4*a*c; if (discr >= 0) { const sqrt = Math.sqrt(discr); return [(-b+sqrt)/(2*a), (-b-sqrt)/(2*a)]; } else { const real = -b/(2*a); const imag = Math.sqrt(-discr)/(2*a); return [`${real}+${imag}i`, `${real}-${imag}i`]; } }

calculators.name: Rent Split Calculator
calculators.description: Fairly divide total rent among roommates based on room size or amenity value. A great tool for housing blogs, roommate‑matching apps, and student life resources.
calculators.calculationFunction: (totalRent: number, weights: number[]): number[] => { const sum = weights.reduce((a,b)=>a+b,0); return weights.map(w=> totalRent * w / sum); }

calculators.name: Debt‑to‑Income Ratio Calculator
calculators.description: Assess borrowing capacity by comparing total monthly debt payments to gross monthly income—crucial for mortgage pre‑qualification content and credit‑education sites.
calculators.calculationFunction: (monthlyDebt: number, monthlyIncome: number): number => (monthlyDebt / monthlyIncome) * 100

calculators.name: Body Surface Area Calculator
calculators.description: Compute Body Surface Area (BSA) using the DuBois formula, useful for medication dosing, medical research, and hospital dosing calculators.
calculators.calculationFunction: (heightCm: number, weightKg: number): number => 0.007184 * Math.pow(heightCm, 0.725) * Math.pow(weightKg, 0.425)
